General.Name: AMAG Austria Metall AG
General.Description: AMAG Austria Metall AG, together with its subsidiaries, produces, processes, and distributes aluminum, aluminum wrought, and cast products in Austria and internationally. The company operates through four divisions: Metal, Casting, Rolling, and Service. The Metal division engages in the aluminum smelting business and control of metal flows. The Casting division recycles aluminum scrap and produces cast alloys. Its product portfolio covers aluminum materials in the form of ingots, sows, and liquid aluminum. The Rolling division manufactures rolled aluminum products, such as sheets, coils, and plates, as well as precision and rolled plates. The Service division provides facility management, energy supply, waste disposal, and purchasing and materials management services. Its products are used in aircraft, automotive, mechanical engineering, construction, packaging, electronics, sports, consumer goods, and architecture sectors. The company was founded in 1939 and is headquartered in Ranshofen, Austria.
